title: we need some help here in oce,
body:
First thing's first, the problem of lag in game isn't necessarily riot's fault, unless something's gone wrong on their end, so i understand if nothing can be done here.

how does one climb ranks with teams consisting of 300ms players (yes plural)? 
I've had multiple games the past 2 weeks with teammates blasting out their ms in chat and loosing lane real hard, what makes matters even worse is when you're the support, there's nothing much i or anyone for tht matter can do in a situation like this, whole team high on lag,... ok maybe if you're really amazing at support tht can carry and hold back a baron, 5 champs, and a shroom, yeh highly unlikely...

Is there some way we can remake a game? nobody's dc'd long enough to remake and the rest of the game is just filled with everyone blaming each other and their internet, im sick of it, every progression towards tht sweet series update just falls down the drain, really fast, the game isn't fun when your team or enemy team is lagging, it pulls the fun out of the game, it's just a time waster now, lag left right and center.

I've had my fair share of serious lagging, but they were genuine network problems on my ISP's end without notice, some of these are just plain trolls, i mean just last game our jungler was downloading elderscrolls online during a ranked game... c'mon man what the hell? 

rito, for the love of mustached poro's, pls help us unfortunate souls here in the OCE who face the same problem as i do, idk how you'll be able to, but pls do try something, i might just be ignorant and not notice you have been trying but yeh, we need help. maybe a quick ping test before entering a queue, idk.

Sorry for throwing this at you, whoever u may be.
Till then, imma play another round... HOPEFULLY i don't get any laggers on my team or enemy team.
